087/**
088 * PlaceholderManager
089 *
090 * @author creatorfromhell
091 * @since 0.1.4.0
092 */
093public class PlaceholderManager {
094
095  private final Map<String, Placeholder> placeholders = new HashMap<>();
096
097  public PlaceholderManager() {
098
099    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceCurRegPlaceholder());
100    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceCurRegStorPlaceholder());
101    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceCurrencyPlaceholder());
102    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceCurStorPlaceholder());
103    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalancePlaceholder());
104    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceRegionPlaceholder());
105    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceRegStorPlaceholder());
106    addPlaceholder(new AccountBalanceStoragePlaceholder());
107
108    addPlaceholder(new BalanceCurRegPlaceholder());
109    addPlaceholder(new BalanceCurRegStorPlaceholder());
110    addPlaceholder(new BalanceCurrencyPlaceholder());
111    addPlaceholder(new BalanceCurStorPlaceholder());
112    addPlaceholder(new BalancePlaceholder());
113    addPlaceholder(new BalanceRegionPlaceholder());
114    addPlaceholder(new BalanceRegStorPlaceholder());
115    addPlaceholder(new BalanceStoragePlaceholder());
116
117    addPlaceholder(new CurrencyNamePlaceholder());
118    addPlaceholder(new CurrencyPrecisionPlaceholder());
119    addPlaceholder(new CurrencySymbolPlaceholder());
120    addPlaceholder(new CurrencyTestPlaceholder());
121    addPlaceholder(new CurrencyTypePlaceholder());
122
123    addPlaceholder(new InfoCreatedPlaceholder());
124    addPlaceholder(new InfoIDPlaceholder());
125    addPlaceholder(new InfoStatusPlaceholder());
126    addPlaceholder(new InfoTypePlaceholder());
127
128    addPlaceholder(new MISCDebugPlaceholder());
129    addPlaceholder(new MISCVersionPlaceholder());
130
131    addPlaceholder(new PermissionBalancePlaceholder());
132    addPlaceholder(new PermissionDepositPlaceholder());
133    addPlaceholder(new PermissionInvitePlaceholder());
134    addPlaceholder(new PermissionTransferPlaceholder());
135    addPlaceholder(new PermissionWithdrawPlaceholder());
136
137    addPlaceholder(new TopPosAccountPlaceholder());
138    addPlaceholder(new TopPosBalancePlaceholder());
139    addPlaceholder(new TopPosHolderPlaceholder());
140    addPlaceholder(new TopPosPlaceholder());
141
142    addPlaceholder(new TransactionCurRegPlaceholder());
143    addPlaceholder(new TransactionCurrencyPlaceholder());
144    addPlaceholder(new TransactionPlaceholder());
145    addPlaceholder(new TransactionRegionPlaceholder());
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Parses the given ID string and returns the corresponding Identifier object.
150   *
151   * @param id The ID string to parse
152   *
153   * @return The Identifier object representing the parsed ID
154   */
155  public static Identifier parseID(@NotNull final String id) {
156
157    switch(id.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)) {
158      case "inventory" -> { return EconomyManager.INVENTORY_ONLY; }
159      case "virtual" -> { return EconomyManager.VIRTUAL; }
160      case "ender" -> { return EconomyManager.E_CHEST; }
161      default -> { return EconomyManager.NORMAL; }
162    }
163  }
164
165  /**
166   * Parses the transaction type string and determines the corresponding identifier for the
167   * transaction.
168   *
169   * @param type The transaction type string to parse
170   *
171   * @return The corresponding identifier for the transaction type
172   */
173  public static String parseTransactionType(@NotNull final String type) {
174
175    switch(type.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)) {
176      case "give" -> { return "give"; }
177      case "take" -> { return "take"; }
178      default -> { return "set"; }
179    }
180  }
181
182  /**
183   * Performs a transaction on the specified account.
184   *
185   * @param account  The account involved in the transaction
186   * @param type     The type of transaction to be performed
187   * @param modifier The modifier for adjusting holdings during the transaction
188   * @param message  A flag indicating whether a message should be sent for the transaction
189   *
190   * @return An Optional containing a receipt of the transaction if successful, otherwise empty
191   * Optional
192   */
193  public static Optional<Receipt> transact(final Account account, final String type,
194                                           final HoldingsModifier modifier, final boolean message) {
195
196    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction(type)
197            .to(account, modifier)
198            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
199            .source(new PluginSource("PAPI"));
200
201    try {
202      final TransactionResult result = transaction.process();
203
204      if(!result.isSuccessful()) {
205        return Optional.empty();
206      }
207
208      if(message) {
209        message(account, type, modifier);
210      }
211
212      return result.getReceipt();
213    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
214      return Optional.empty();
215    }
216  }
217
218  public static void message(final Account account, final String type, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
219
220    if(type.equalsIgnoreCase("set")) return;
221
222    final String message = (type.equalsIgnoreCase("take"))? "Messages.Money.Taken" : "Messages.Money.Given";
223    final MessageData msgData = new MessageData(message);
224    msgData.addReplacement("$player", MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name"));
225    msgData.addReplacement("$currency", modifier.getCurrency());
226    msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
227    MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
228
229    if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
230
231      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
232
233      provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
234    }
235  }
236
237  /**
238   * Parses the holdings entries for a specific account based on region, currency, ID, and
239   * formatting preference.
240   *
241   * @param account   The account to retrieve holdings from
242   * @param region    The region to get holdings for
243   * @param currency  The currency UUID for the holdings
244   * @param id        The ID string representing the type of holdings to retrieve
245   * @param formatted Boolean indicating whether the holdings should be formatted
246   *
247   * @return A string representation of the parsed holdings based on the given criteria
248   */
249  public static final String parseHoldings(@NotNull final Account account, @NotNull final String region,
250                                           final @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull final String id,
251                                           final boolean formatted) {
252
253    final Identifier parsedID = parseID(id);
254
255    final List<HoldingsEntry> entries = account.getHoldings(region, currency, parsedID);
256
257    final HoldingsEntry entry = (!entries.isEmpty())? entries.get(0) : new HoldingsEntry(region, currency, BigDecimal.ZERO, parsedID);
258
259    if(formatted) {
260      return CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry);
261    }
262    return entry.getAmount().toPlainString();
263  }
264
265
266  //Static
267
268  public final @Nullable String onRequest(@Nullable final String account, @NotNull final String[] params) {
269
270    final Optional<Placeholder> placeholderOptional = placeholder(params);
271    if(placeholderOptional.isPresent()) {
272      return placeholderOptional.get().onRequest(account, params);
273    }
274    return null;
275  }
276
277  /**
278   * Retrieves the placeholder that applies to the given parameters.
279   *
280   * @param params The parameters to match against placeholders
281   *
282   * @return Optional containing the matching placeholder if found, empty Optional otherwise
283   */
284  public final Optional<Placeholder> placeholder(final String[] params) {
285
286    for(final Placeholder holder : placeholders.values()) {
287
288      if(holder.applies(params)) {
289
290        return Optional.of(holder);
291      }
292    }
293    return Optional.empty();
294  }
295
296  /**
297   * Adds the provided placeholder to the PlaceholderManager for later retrieval.
298   *
299   * @param placeholder The Placeholder object to add
300   */
301  public final void addPlaceholder(@NotNull final Placeholder placeholder) {
302
303    placeholders.put(placeholder.identifier(), placeholder);
304  }
305
306  public final Map<String, Placeholder> placeholders() {
307
308    return placeholders;
309  }
310}
